sourcesContent:
<template>
    <a-modal title="新建用户" :visible="value" @cancel="bindClickCancel" @ok="bindClickOk" okText="提交" cancelText="取消">
        <a-form :form="form">
            <a-form-item label="用户名" v-bind="formItemLayout">
                <a-input v-decorator="userDecorator.userName" placeholder="请输入"/>
            </a-form-item>
            <a-form-item label="角色" v-bind="formItemLayout">
                <a-select v-decorator="userDecorator.roleId" placeholder="请选择" mode="multiple">
                    <a-select-option v-for="item in roles.records" :key="item.roleId" :value="item.roleId">
                        {{item.roleName}}
                    </a-select-option>
                </a-select>
            </a-form-item>
        </a-form>
    </a-modal>
</template>

<script>
    import {RoleApi, UserApi} from '@/api';
    import {FormMixin} from '@/mixins';
    import Pagination from "@/common/domain/Pagination";

    let roles = {};

    export default {
        name: "UserCreate",
        mixins: [FormMixin],
        props: {
            value: {
                type: Boolean,
                default: false
            }
        },
        data() {
            return {
                roles
            }
        },
        methods: {
            getRoles() {
                RoleApi.get(new Pagination(1, 1000)).then(res => this.roles = res);
            },
            createUser(user) {
                UserApi.create(user).then(res => {
                    this.$message.success("新建成功，默认密码为'123'");
                    this.bindClickCancel();
                    this.$emit("success");
                });
            },
            bindClickOk() {
                this.form.validateFields((err, values) => {
                    if (!err) this.createUser(values);
                });
            },
            bindClickCancel() {
                this.form.resetFields();
                this.$emit('input', false);
            },
        },
        watch: {
            value() {
                this.getRoles();
            }
        }
    }
</script>
